sentence.Network_en: She handed the cigar back to Jason with a self-satisfied smile.
sentence.Network_cn: 她得意地笑着把雪茄给贾森递了回去。

sentence.Network_cn: 他把手伸进胸前口袋里拿雪茄烟盒。

sentence.Network_cn: 他停下来，踩灭了手中的烟头。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French cigare, or from Spanish cigarro, probably from Mayan sik'ar 'smoking'

encyclopedia.content: CIGAR--Covered in Ground Anaerobic Reactor, 半地下式厌氧发酵系统，用于处理高浓度有机废水并产生沼气进行回收利用。CIGAR是新西兰waste solution公司的专利技术，已经在世界各地取得了应用。 CIGAR NO.1...........NO.6 韩国的一种香烟香精很多，不是很好抽。 好像有NO.1、NO.2、NO.3……的一个系列品牌。

entry.def: Cigars are rolls of dried tobacco leaves which people smoke.

example.ex: He was sitting alone smoking a big cigar.
example.tran: 他一个人坐着，抽着一支大雪茄。

means.word_mean: 1. a roll of tobacco for smoking

jushi.english: I lit a cigar to calm my nerves.
jushi.chinese: 我点燃了一支雪茄烟使自己的神经平静下来。

jushi.english: He bought a cigar holder for his father yesterday.
jushi.chinese: 他昨天给他的父亲买了一只雪茄烟烟嘴。

jushi.english: My father allows himself only three cigars a day.
jushi.chinese: 我爸爸给自己规定一天只抽三支雪茄烟。
